targets.rawSql: select count(distinct(content_id)) as "Total Unique Contents" from ipl_test where $__timeFilter(created_at);
select platform as "Platform", count(distinct(content_id)) as "Total Unique Contents" from ipl_test where $__timeFilter(created_at) group by platform;

panels.title: No Of Unique Contents Tested Per Platform

targets.rawSql:
select platform as "Platform",
sum(
  DATE_PART('day', updated_at::timestamp-created_at::timestamp)*24 +
	DATE_PART('hour', updated_at::timestamp-created_at::timestamp) +
	DATE_PART('minute', updated_at::timestamp-created_at::timestamp)/60 +
	DATE_PART('second', updated_at::timestamp-created_at::timestamp)/36600
) as "No Of Hrs" from ipl_test where $__timeFilter(created_at) group by platform order by "No Of Hrs" desc;

panels.title: Total No Of Hours Tests Ran Per Platform

targets.rawSql: select platform as "Platform", count(*) as "No Of Tests" from ipl_test where $__timeFilter(created_at) group by platform;

panels.title: Total No Of Tests Executed Per Platform
No Of Unique Contents Tested - X
No Of Unique Contents Tested Per Platform - X

targets.rawSql:
select platform as "Platform",
sum(
  DATE_PART('day', updated_at::timestamp-created_at::timestamp)*24 +
	DATE_PART('hour', updated_at::timestamp-created_at::timestamp) +
	DATE_PART('minute', updated_at::timestamp-created_at::timestamp)/60 +
	DATE_PART('second', updated_at::timestamp-created_at::timestamp)/36600
) as "No Of Hrs" from content_validation_x where $__timeFilter(created_at) group by platform order by "No Of Hrs" desc;

panels.title: Total No Of Hours Tests Ran Per Platform - X

targets.rawSql: select platform as "Platform", count(*) as "No Of Tests" from content_validation_x where $__timeFilter(created_at) group by platform;

panels.title: Total No Of Tests Executed Per Platform - X

targets.rawSql:
select js.key as "Config Key", js.value as "Value"
from config, json_each(config.data::json) as js
